com.github.mk23.jmxproxy

Class JMXProxyResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mk23.jmxproxy.JMXProxyResource

  • @Path(value="/")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public class JMXProxyResource
extends Object

    Service API resource handlers.

    Provides handler methods for the service resources. Maintains the lifecycle ConnectionManager object for fulfilling requests. All responses are marshalled to application/json content type by Jersey.
    Since:
    2015-05-11
    Version:
    3.2.0
    Author:
    mk23
    See Also:
    javax.ws.rs.core.Response

    • Constructor Summary

      Default constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JMXProxyResource

        public JMXProxyResource(ConnectionManager manager)

        Default constructor.

        Saves the ConnectionManager object for querying on API requests.
        Parameters:
        manager - of the endpoint cache.

    • Method Detail

      • getConfiguration

        @GET
 @Path(value="config")
public final javax.ws.rs.core.Response getConfiguration()

        Anonymous GET handler for /jmxproxy/config.

        Accepts HTTP GET requests. Responds with the full runtime configuration object from the ConnectionManager.
        Returns:
        The runtime configuration object marshalled into an API Response.

      • getCachedEndpoints

        @GET
public final javax.ws.rs.core.Response getCachedEndpoints()

        Anonymous GET handler for /.

        Accepts HTTP GET requests. Responds with a list of cached endpoints available on the ConnectionManager.
        Returns:
        List of cached endpoints, marshalled into an API Response.

      • delCachedEndpoint

        @DELETE
 @Path(value="{host}:{port:\\d+}")
public final javax.ws.rs.core.Response delCachedEndpoint(@PathParam(value="host")
                                                                                                    String host,
                                                                                                    @PathParam(value="port")
                                                                                                    int port)

        Anonymous DELETE handler for /<host:port>.

        Accepts HTTP DELETE requests. Attemps to remove the specified endpoint and returns operation success status as a boolean.
        Parameters:
        host - requested endpoint DNS host name or IP address. Specified on the URI path.
        port - requested endpoint TCP port. Specified on the URI path.
        Returns:
        boolean true mapped into an API Response.

      • getJMXHostData

        @GET
 @Path(value="{host}:{port:\\d+}/{mbean}/{attribute}")
public final javax.ws.rs.core.Response getJMXHostData(@PathParam(value="host")
                                                                                                                  String host,
                                                                                                                  @PathParam(value="port")
                                                                                                                  int port,
                                                                                                                  @PathParam(value="mbean")
                                                                                                                  String mbean,
                                                                                                                  @PathParam(value="attribute")
                                                                                                                  String attribute,
                                                                                                                  @QueryParam(value="limit") @DefaultValue(value="-1")
                                                                                                                  int limit)

        Anonymous GET handler for /<host>:<port>/<mbean>/<attribute>.

        Accepts HTTP GET requests. Responds with a single value or a list of historical values for the requested attribute.
        Parameters:
        host - requested endpoint DNS host name or IP address. Specified on the URI path.
        port - requested endpoint TCP port. Specified on the URI path.
        mbean - name of the mbean on the requested endpoint. Specified on the URI path.
        attribute - name of the attribute on the requested mbean Specified on the URI path.
        limit - number of historical values to include when fetching the full map. If set to -1 (default) will only return latest value. Specified as a URI query param.
        Returns:
        The requested value, or list of values, marshalled into an API Response.

      • getJMXHostData

        @POST
 @Path(value="{host}:{port:\\d+}/{mbean}/{attribute}")
 @Consumes(value="application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
public final javax.ws.rs.core.Response getJMXHostData(@PathParam(value="host")
                                                                                                                                                                         String host,
                                                                                                                                                                         @PathParam(value="port")
                                                                                                                                                                         int port,
                                                                                                                                                                         @PathParam(value="mbean")
                                                                                                                                                                         String mbean,
                                                                                                                                                                         @PathParam(value="attribute")
                                                                                                                                                                         String attribute,
                                                                                                                                                                         @QueryParam(value="limit") @DefaultValue(value="-1")
                                                                                                                                                                         int limit,
                                                                                                                                                                         @FormParam(value="username")
                                                                                                                                                                         String username,
                                                                                                                                                                         @FormParam(value="password")
                                                                                                                                                                         String password)

        Authenticated POST handler for /<host>:<port>/<mbean>/<attribute>.

        Accepts HTTP POST requests with data encoded as application/x-www-form-urlencoded, containing endpoint credentials. Responds with a single value or a list of historical values for the requested attribute.
        Parameters:
        host - requested endpoint DNS host name or IP address. Specified on the URI path.
        port - requested endpoint TCP port. Specified on the URI path.
        mbean - name of the mbean on the requested endpoint. Specified on the URI path.
        attribute - name of the attribute on the requested mbean Specified on the URI path.
        limit - number of historical values to include when fetching the full map. If set to -1 (default) will only return latest value. Specified as a URI query param.
        username - authentication username for the requested endpoint. Specified as the POST body param.
        password - authentication password for the requested endpoint. Specified as the POST body param.
        Returns:
        The requested value, or list of values, marshalled into an API Response.

      • getJMXHostData

        @POST
 @Path(value="{host}:{port:\\d+}/{mbean}/{attribute}")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public final javax.ws.rs.core.Response getJMXHostData(@PathParam(value="host")
                                                                                                                                                        String host,
                                                                                                                                                        @PathParam(value="port")
                                                                                                                                                        int port,
                                                                                                                                                        @PathParam(value="mbean")
                                                                                                                                                        String mbean,
                                                                                                                                                        @PathParam(value="attribute")
                                                                                                                                                        String attribute,
                                                                                                                                                        @QueryParam(value="limit") @DefaultValue(value="-1")
                                                                                                                                                        int limit,
                                                                                                                                                        @Valid @NotNull
                                                                                                                                                        @Valid @NotNull ConnectionCredentials auth)

        Authenticated POST handler for /<host>:<port>/<mbean>/<attribute>.

        Accepts HTTP POST requests with data encoded as application/json, containing endpoint credentials. Responds with a single value or a list of historical values for the requested attribute.
        Parameters:
        host - requested endpoint DNS host name or IP address. Specified on the URI path.
        port - requested endpoint TCP port. Specified on the URI path.
        mbean - name of the mbean on the requested endpoint. Specified on the URI path.
        attribute - name of the attribute on the requested mbean Specified on the URI path.
        limit - number of historical values to include when fetching the full map. If set to -1 (default) will only return latest value. Specified as a URI query param.
        auth - credentials for the requested endpoint specified as the POST body param as a JSON object (e.g. {"username": "max", "password": "12345"}) and marshaled into ConnectionCredentials.
        Returns:
        The requested value, or list of values, marshalled into an API Response.

      • getJMXHostData

        @GET
 @Path(value="{host}:{port:\\d+}/{mbean}")
public final javax.ws.rs.core.Response getJMXHostData(@PathParam(value="host")
                                                                                                      String host,
                                                                                                      @PathParam(value="port")
                                                                                                      int port,
                                                                                                      @PathParam(value="mbean")
                                                                                                      String mbean,
                                                                                                      @QueryParam(value="limit") @DefaultValue(value="-1")
                                                                                                      int limit,
                                                                                                      @QueryParam(value="full") @DefaultValue(value="false")
                                                                                                      io.dropwizard.jersey.params.BooleanParam full)

        Anonymous GET handler for /<host>:<port>/<mbean>.

        Accepts HTTP GET requests. Responds with a list of attributes available for the requested mbean or a map of attribute name and value(s) based on modifier parameters.
        Parameters:
        host - requested endpoint DNS host name or IP address. Specified on the URI path.
        port - requested endpoint TCP port. Specified on the URI path.
        mbean - name of the mbean on the requested endpoint. Specified on the URI path.
        limit - number of historical values to include when fetching the full map. If set to -1 (default) will only return latest value. Specified as a URI query param.
        full - boolean controlling whether to return full map of names and values or just a list of attribute names. Specified as a URI query param.
        Returns:
        List of attribute names or map of names and values, marshalled into an API Response.

      • getJMXHostData

        @POST
 @Path(value="{host}:{port:\\d+}/{mbean}")
 @Consumes(value="application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
public final javax.ws.rs.core.Response getJMXHostData(@PathParam(value="host")
                                                                                                                                                             String host,
                                                                                                                                                             @PathParam(value="port")
                                                                                                                                                             int port,
                                                                                                                                                             @PathParam(value="mbean")
                                                                                                                                                             String mbean,
                                                                                                                                                             @QueryParam(value="limit") @DefaultValue(value="-1")
                                                                                                                                                             int limit,
                                                                                                                                                             @QueryParam(value="full") @DefaultValue(value="false")
                                                                                                                                                             io.dropwizard.jersey.params.BooleanParam full,
                                                                                                                                                             @FormParam(value="username")
                                                                                                                                                             String username,
                                                                                                                                                             @FormParam(value="password")
                                                                                                                                                             String password)

        Authenticated POST handler for /<host>:<port>/<mbean>.

        Accepts HTTP POST requests with data encoded as application/x-www-form-urlencoded, containing endpoint credentials. Responds with a list of attributes available for the requested mbean or a map of attribute name and value(s) based on modifier parameters.
        Parameters:
        host - requested endpoint DNS host name or IP address. Specified on the URI path.
        port - requested endpoint TCP port. Specified on the URI path.
        mbean - name of the mbean on the requested endpoint. Specified on the URI path.
        limit - number of historical values to include when fetching the full map. If set to -1 (default) will only return latest value. Specified as a URI query param.
        full - boolean controlling whether to return full map of names and values or just a list of attribute names. Specified as a URI query param.
        username - authentication username for the requested endpoint. Specified as the POST body param.
        password - authentication password for the requested endpoint. Specified as the POST body param.
        Returns:
        List of attribute names or map of names and values, marshalled into an API Response.

      • getJMXHostData

        @POST
 @Path(value="{host}:{port:\\d+}/{mbean}")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public final javax.ws.rs.core.Response getJMXHostData(@PathParam(value="host")
                                                                                                                                            String host,
                                                                                                                                            @PathParam(value="port")
                                                                                                                                            int port,
                                                                                                                                            @PathParam(value="mbean")
                                                                                                                                            String mbean,
                                                                                                                                            @QueryParam(value="limit") @DefaultValue(value="-1")
                                                                                                                                            int limit,
                                                                                                                                            @QueryParam(value="full") @DefaultValue(value="false")
                                                                                                                                            io.dropwizard.jersey.params.BooleanParam full,
                                                                                                                                            @Valid @NotNull
                                                                                                                                            @Valid @NotNull ConnectionCredentials auth)

        Authenticated POST handler for /<host>:<port>/<mbean>.

        Accepts HTTP POST requests with data encoded as application/json, containing endpoint credentials. Responds with a list of attributes available for the requested mbean or a map of attribute name and value(s) based on modifier parameters.
        Parameters:
        host - requested endpoint DNS host name or IP address. Specified on the URI path.
        port - requested endpoint TCP port. Specified on the URI path.
        mbean - name of the mbean on the requested endpoint. Specified on the URI path.
        limit - number of historical values to include when fetching the full map. If set to -1 (default) will only return latest value. Specified as a URI query param.
        full - boolean controlling whether to return full map of names and values or just a list of attribute names. Specified as a URI query param.
        auth - credentials for the requested endpoint specified as the POST body param as a JSON object (e.g. {"username": "max", "password": "12345"}) and marshaled into ConnectionCredentials.
        Returns:
        List of attribute names or map of names and values, marshalled into an API Response.

                                                                                              io.dropwizard.jersey.params.BooleanParam full)

        Anonymous GET handler for /<host>:<port>.

        Accepts HTTP GET requests. Responds with a list of mbeans available on the requested endpoint or a map of means, attributes and their values or lists of values based on modifier parameters.
        Parameters:
        host - requested endpoint DNS host name or IP address. Specified on the URI path.
        port - requested endpoint TCP port. Specified on the URI path.
        limit - number of historical values to include when fetching the full map. If set to -1 (default) will only return latest value. Specified as a URI query param.
        full - boolean controlling whether to return full map of names and values or just a list of attribute names. Specified as a URI query param.
        Returns:
        List of mbean names or map of names and values, marshalled into an API Response.
